summary.Title: Experienced Nail Technician
summary.Presentation: Located on Vesterbrogade 35, our nail and beauty salon, La Vân Studio focuses on the above-and-beyond customer experience. Currently, rated 5.0 on Google, we are looking for experienced colleagues&

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Located on Vesterbrogade 35, our nail and beauty salon, La Vân Studio focuses on the above-and-beyond customer experience. Currently, rated 5.0 on Google, we are looking for experienced colleagues  to genuinely connect with our customers and perform treatments.

Responsibilities:

  • Perform customer treatments (manicures, pedicures, nail art, head spa)

  • Ensure efficient and effective service delivery in a tidy store environment

  • Assist in staff planning, social media posting and other minor tasks

Requirements:

  • Extensive technician experience (min. 2 years) with gel nails and / products

  • Strong communication skills (English and/or 1x Scandinavian language)

  • Strong customer service mindset and high willingness to learn and develop

Benefits:

  • Competitive salary package in accordance with your skills and experience

  • Opportunities for career development via the La Van trainee program 

  • A supportive, encouraging and creative work environment

Please send your CV and application letter to: go@lavan.beauty

 

If you have any questions, do contact us via mail or phone +4593908995,

La Van Studio
